attributes.action: give every pregnant woman the chance to have another scan later in their pregnancy to determine if the baby is NOT in the breech position
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The normal NHS rules for pregnant ladies is to have a scan at 12 weeks and another at 20 weeks, but no more for the next 18 - 22 weeks of pregnancy.  I myself had the midwives tell me for 2 months that my baby's head was "engaged", but this turned out to be her feet.  I feel that once a midwife has stated that the baby's head is engaged, the mother should be offered a further scan to determine if they are correct.
